title: Common subscription configuration
description: Configuration settings for all subscriptions to the message bus.

close.timeout.description: Time in ms to wait when closing underlying bus objects for this subscription.

poll.timeout.description: Time in ms to wait for a response from the bus when calling poll.

thread.stop.timeout.description: Time in ms to wait for the subscription processing thread to terminate on close

processor.retries.description: Number of times to retry internal intermittent failures before throwing back to the client

subscribe.retries.description: Number of times to attempt to subscribe to the underlying bus before throwing back to the client

commit.retries.description: Number of times to attempt to commit a transaction before throwing back to the client

processor.timeout.description: Time in ms to wait for an individual event to process. This is applied if the subscription must also maintain state that needs to be periodically serviced.
